<js>
  json=[];
  if(baseUrl.match(/★/)){
  list=baseUrl.replace(/http.*?wd=\s*/,'').split('★');
  for(i in list){
  href=list[i].match(/【(.*?)】/)[1];
  text=list[i].match(/《(.*?)》/)[1];
  intro=list[i].match(/◎(.*?)◎/)[1];
  indexUrl=list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)?list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)[1]:list[i].match(/^(.*?)【/)[1]
   if(indexUrl.indexOf('https://xiang-shiwang.gitee.io')!=-1 || indexUrl.indexOf('http://xiang-shiwang.gitee.io')!=-1  || indexUrl.indexOf('http://jnztgtjy.usa3.345888.xyz/rss/fb.php')!=-1 || indexUrl.indexOf('https://jnztgtjy.usa3.345888.xyz/rss/fb.php')!=-1 ){
       if(indexUrl.indexOf('?')==-1){
           indexUrl+='?v='+new Date().getTime()
       }else{
            indexUrl+='?&='+new Date().getTime()
       }
   } json.push({text:text,src:href,intro:intro,index:indexUrl})
  }
  }
  JSON.stringify(json)
  </js>

搜索就是把网址里关键字的部分换成{{source.getVariable()}}
大部分第一页网址和后面页的网址是不一样的，复制一下后面页的网址，把里面的页码数换成{{page}}，再用<>把网址里不同于第一页网址的部分括起来，<>里最前方加的英文格式逗号表示当{{page}}为0或者1时忽略掉括号里的部分，这样第一页的网址就没有括号的部分了(这样就能获取到第一页的正确网址了)。

'' : eval(html.match(/(eval.*video.*\)\))/m)[1]); if (url !== '') { url1 = String(url).replace(/\/[^\/]+\/[^\/]+$/, '/'); res = String(java.ajax(String(url).replace(/\/[^\/]+\/[^\/]+$/, '/playlist.m3u8'))); sizes = res.match(/RESOLUTION=\d+x\d+/g).map(e => e.split('x')[1]); srcs = res.match(/(.*\/video\.m3u8)/g); for (j in srcs) { Value.push({src:url1+srcs[j],size:sizes[j]}); } Value.sort((a, b) => parseInt(b.size) - parseInt(a.size)); value = JSON.stringify(Value); } bt = J.select('[property="og:title"]').attr('content'); fh = '🎬 番号：' + FH + fhs[i]; lx = '📦 类型：' + String(/找不到页面/.test(html) ? '' : J.select('.text-secondary:contains(类型:)').text()).replace(/类型:/,''); fm = J.select('video').attr('data-poster'); style = /找不到页面/.test(html) ? ' style="display:none;"' : ''; } return ``; }).join('\n'); style = /none.*none/s.test(jishu) ? ' style="display:none;"' : ''; jishu = `
\n

${jishu}

ruleArticles:
<js>
url = source.getVariable()
if (url==""){java.toast("\n可通过登录或设置源变量获取搜索地址")}
resultList=[]
webSrc=java.ajax(url)
d = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(webSrc)
title=d.select("title").text()
java.log(d)
explore=[]
d.select(`a[href~=sort|list|rank|tag|shuku|fenlei|Soft|allvisit|paihang|quanben|gudian|lishi|dushi|wangyou|kehuan|yanqing|wuxia|xuanhuan|chuanyue|zhentan|kongbu|top|category|mulu]:not(a:matches(\\d+|下一页|登录|注册|More\+))`).forEach(a=>{
	url=String(a.attr("href")).replace(/1(\.html)?(\/)?$/,`{{page}}$1$2`)
	if(!explore.find(e=>e.url==url)){
		explore.push({title:a.text(),url:url})
		}
	})

charset=webSrc.match(/charset="?([^"]+)"/)?String(webSrc.match(/charset="?([^"]+)"/)[1]).toUpperCase():""
//charset = d.select("meta[charset]").attr("charset").toUpperCase()
forms = d.select("form")
forms.forEach(form => {
	   java.log(form)
    let action = form.attr("action")
    let method = form.attr("method").toUpperCase()
    formInner = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(form.html())
    let names = formInner.select("[name]")
    let body = []
    let searchUrl = []
    let options = {}
    names.forEach(n => {
        let name = n.attr("name")
        let value = n.attr("value") == "" ? `${/(search)?key/i.test(name) ? "{{key}}" : ""}` : n.attr("value")
        if (names.length == 1 || /(输入|可搜)/.test(value)||name.match(/^(q|wd)$/)||/(search)?key(word)?/i.test(name)) {
            value = "{{key}}"
        }
        if (value == "" && n.select("option").length > 0) {
            value = n.select("option")[0].attr("value")
        }
        body.push(`${name}=${value}`)
    })
    body = body.join("&")
    java.log(body)
    if (method == "GET"||method=="") {
        searchUrl.push(`${action}?${body}`)
    } else if (method == "POST") {
        searchUrl.push(action)
        options.body = body
        options.method = method
    }
    if (!/UTF-?8/.test(charset) && charset != "") {
        options.charset = charset
    }
    if (Object.keys(options).length) {
        searchUrl.push(JSON.stringify(options, null, "  "))
    }
    result = searchUrl.join(",")
    resultList.push({"index":String(source.getVariable()).replace(/,.*/,"")+"\n搜索地址"+resultList.length,"url":result,title:title,explore:JSON.stringify(explore)})
    java.log(result)
})
//java.log(JSON.stringify(resultList))
if (resultList.length==0){
	resultList.push({"index":String(source.getVariable()).replace(/,.*/,"")+"\n未找到搜索地址","url":"",title:title,explore:JSON.stringify(explore)})
	if(/webview/i.test(source.getVariable())){java.toast("未找到搜索地址")}else if(source.getVariable()!=""){java.toast("\n请尝试切换为webview获取或切换UA")}}
result=JSON.stringify(resultList)
</js>

//获取集数 var n = 0; var names = ['原版视频']; var list = []; URL = baseUrl; list.push(URL); jishu = list.map(($, i)=>{ var value = '',name = '',bt = '',fm = ''; html = $ == baseUrl ? result : java.ajax($); J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html); name = names[i]; var Value = []; var Value1 = []; var list1 = J.select('.wrap:contains(Download)').select('a'); for (j in list1) { Value1.push({src:String(list1[j].attr('href')).replace(/([^']+\/get_file\/\d+\/[^']{32}).*/,'$1'),size:String(list1[j].text()).replace(/.*?(\d+)p/,'$1')}); } Value1.sort((a, b) => parseInt(b.size) - parseInt(a.size)); var regex = /function\/0\/([^']+\/get_file\/[^']+)/g; var Value2 = []; let match; while ((match = regex.exec(html)) !== null) { Value2.push({src:String(match[1]).replace(/[^']+\/get_file\/\d+\/[^']{32}(.*)/,'$1'),size:String(match[1]).replace(/.*?_(\d+)p?\..*/,'$1')}); } Value2.sort((a, b) => parseInt(b.size) - parseInt(a.size)); for (j in Value1) { Value.push({src:Value1[j].src+Value2[j].src,size:Value1[j].size}); } value = JSON.stringify(Value); bt = J.select('h1')[0].text(); fm = Get('url') + '/contents/videos_screenshots/' + String(Value2[0].src).replace(/.*?\/(\d+\/\d+\/).*/,'$1') + 'preview.jpg'; return ``; }).join('\n'); style = ' style="display:none;"'; jishu = `
\n

🎥 视频版本：‎

\n

${jishu}

\n
\n`; //返回json JSON.stringify({ jishu: jishu }) {{@@h1@text}}

var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;

try {
    var parsed = JSON.parse(result);
    var searchPattern = new RegExp(source.getVariable());
    var targetArray;
    if (parsed.posts && parsed.posts instanceof Array) {    
        targetArray = parsed.posts;
    } else {   
        var collections = parsed.collections || [];
        var sources = parsed.sources || [];
        targetArray = [].concat(collections, sources);
    }
    var filtered = targetArray.filter(function(r) {
        return JSON.stringify(r).match(searchPattern);
    });
    JSON.stringify(filtered);
} catch(e) {
   
    var doc = JsDom.parse(result);
    var links = doc.select(".nav-links>a");
    var resultList = [{
        "title": "玄蛋秘阁",
        "comment": "发布页主页",
        "path": baseUrl
    }];
    
    for (var i = 0; i < links.size(); i++) {
        var link = links.get(i);
        resultList.push({
            "title": link.text(),
            "path": link.attr("href"),
            "comment": "更多内容自由探索",
        });
    }
    JSON.stringify(resultList);
}</js>

sourceComment:
/*
	玄蛋秘阁
by天天的鸟蛋蛋
请用最新测试版

# 介绍
自己的个人博客，是一个静态博客所有数据都是md 记录（收集）了一些我的笔记 有些是从网上搜集，有些是自己写的
# 使用方法
登录 源站 是访问源网站
默认 全部
通过源变量来搜索
登录分类归档会改变源变量
回到全部分类可以点全部按钮或者初始化
其他的就是字面意思
# 感谢 
by另一个书友圈 提供登录改变变量方法
by河鹅和 修复正文bug  无法渲染空格  和 变量搜索
by怣疯  提供正文思路

更新日志：
2025/3/6 更新正文 
主要更新
1.优化正文
2.加入更好的高亮 
3.加入黑暗模式
4.加入代码框一键复制
5.加入打开原贴
2025/3/20 转移数据
从serv00的php 转移到 GitHub Pages py生成数据 github自动工作流 因此更新
2025/5/28 增加功能
1.新增书源发布页(增加更多功能)
2.优化代码
*/

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
eval(String(Reload('https://qyyuapi.com/dy/file/history.js')));
var data = [];
if (/\/search\?/.test(baseUrl)) {
    var list = java.getElements('.topic-list-box');
    for (i in list) {
        data.push({
            'name': list[i].select('.h3').text(),
            'time': String(String(list[i].select('.topic-list-item--author').text()).replace(/\s*(.*?)\s*\[(.*?)\]\s*/,'$1/$2') + '/' + String(list[i].select('.tag').text()).replace(/\s+/g,',')).replace(/\/undefined/,''),
            'cover': String(list[i].select('.topic-list-item__cover amp-img').attr('src')).replace(/\?.*$/g,''),
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.topic-list-item').attr('href')
        });
    }
} else {
    var list = JSON.parse(result).items;
    for (i in list) {
        data.push({
            'name': list[i].name,
            'time': String(String(list[i].author + '/' + list[i].region_name + '/' + list[i].type_names)).replace(/\/undefined/,''),
            'cover': 'https://static-a.xgcartoon.com/cover/' + list[i].topic_img,
            'url': Get('url') + '/detail/' + list[i].cartoon_id
        });
    }
}
data;
</js>
